name: piroshki
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a small Russian pastry filled with savoury or sweet food, and then baked or fried: She brought me some freshly prepared potato and onion piroshkis. There were home-made piroshki and shelves of pickles and jams. We shared a piroshky, a Russian pastry stuffed with cheese and spinach. Traditional Eastern European items such as blini, pirozhki, and sausages are easy to find.
More examplesFewer examplesPiroshki are small turnovers or dumplings from Russia, ﬁlled with a savoury or sweet stuffing.If you like Russian food, this dough also makes very good piroshki.He dropped his piroshky into his soup.
